CatStacks

Welcome to CatStacks!

To play, press any key to drop a cat

Try to land cats on the stack to get more points

The game ends when all your lives are gone

Welcome to CatStacks!

To play, press any key to drop a cat.

Once you've dropped the cat, it will freefall until it lands on the stack or off the edge!

Try to stack as many cats as you can before you run out of lives.
